languages.text: {n}Хормейстер сжимает аквилу на поясе так крепко, что золотые крылья впиваются в кожу до крови.{/n} "Вы... правы, Ваша Светлость. Желание покинуть пост — малодушие и преступление против Него".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хормейстер сжимает аквилу на поясе так крепко, что золотые крылья впиваются в кожу до крови.{/n} "Вы... правы, Ваша Светлость. Желание покинуть пост — малодушие и преступление против Него".

languages.text: {n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."
languages.original_text: {n}Хормейстер сжимает аквилу на поясе так крепко, что золотые крылья впиваются в кожу до крови.{/n} "Вы... правы, Ваша Светлость. Желание покинуть пост — малодушие и преступление против Него".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

{n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

{n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

{n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

{n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

{n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

languages.text: {n}El maestro del Coro aprieta el Aquila de su cinto con tanta fuerza que las doradas alas de la efigie se clavan en su mano y la hacen sangrar.{/n} «Es... es verdad, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Querer renunciar a mi cargo es una cobardía y una afrenta contra Él».
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro del Coro aprieta el Aquila de su cinto con tanta fuerza que las doradas alas de la efigie se clavan en su mano y la hacen sangrar.{/n} «Es... es verdad, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Querer renunciar a mi cargo es una cobardía y una afrenta contra Él».

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターはベルトのアクィラを強く握りしめたせいで、金の翼が彼の拳から血を流させた。{/n}「あなたの言うとおりです、陛下。私の持ち場を放棄することは臆病であり、主に対する侮辱です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターはベルトのアクィラを強く握りしめたせいで、金の翼が彼の拳から血を流させた。{/n}「あなたの言うとおりです、陛下。私の持ち場を放棄することは臆病であり、主に対する侮辱です」

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师紧握着腰带上的双头鹰吊坠，握得双头鹰金色的翅膀都沾上了血迹。{/n}“您……您说得没错，大人。放弃职位的想法实在是懦弱之举，是对神皇的冒渎。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师紧握着腰带上的双头鹰吊坠，握得双头鹰金色的翅膀都沾上了血迹。{/n}“您……您说得没错，大人。放弃职位的想法实在是懦弱之举，是对神皇的冒渎。”

languages.text: {n}Der Chormeister umfasst den Aquila an seinem Gürtel so fest, dass seine goldenen Flügel seine Hand einschneiden.{/n} "Ihr ... habt recht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Wunsch, meinen Posten zu verlassen, zeugt von Feigheit und beleidigt Ihn."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Chormeister umfasst den Aquila an seinem Gürtel so fest, dass seine goldenen Flügel seine Hand einschneiden.{/n} "Ihr ... habt recht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Wunsch, meinen Posten zu verlassen, zeugt von Feigheit und beleidigt Ihn."

languages.text: {n}Le maître de chœur serre l'insigne de l'Aquila de sa ceinture si fort que du sang commence à ruisseler de son poing.{/n} « Vous… avez raison, Votre Seigneurie. Le simple fait d'envisager d'abandonner mon poste n'est rien de moins que de la couardise, et une véritable offense à Son égard. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître de chœur serre l'insigne de l'Aquila de sa ceinture si fort que du sang commence à ruisseler de son poing.{/n} « Vous… avez raison, Votre Seigneurie. Le simple fait d'envisager d'abandonner mon poste n'est rien de moins que de la couardise, et une véritable offense à Son égard. »

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi, kemerindeki Çift Başlı Kartal'ı öylesine sıkı kavrıyor ki altın kanatlar avcunu kanatıyor.{/n} "Haklısınız... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Görev yerimden ayrılmayı isteyerek hem korkaklık etmiş hem de O'na karşı kusur işlemiş olurum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster grips the Aquila on his belt so tightly that the gold wings draw blood from his fist.{/n} "You... are right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Wishing to abandon my post is cowardice and an offence against Him."
